channel.title: Floating bodies
channel.description: I spotted this weird thing. The corpses are just standing upright or floating in mid air. [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=439555530[/url]

item.title: Floating bodies
item.dc:creator: techdude59
item.description:
I am also having this problem. It seems to be specific to map bm_c2a2b from the chapter ON A RAIL. Also, it doesn’t happen until loading a save on the map and only affects corpses that were already there before the save. It doesn’t seem to happen on the next map either.

Read full topic
